attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that Alan Shearer should be awarded Knighthood because the duties he served for football, his country and club are unbelievable, over his whole career he has had the footballing world in awe at his skill and professionalism, he has served football well so that is why we believe he should be awarded Knighthood.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
